about_the_game:
Step into the dangerous world of Project0. Your mission is straightforward, follow The Agency's orders and then escape in one piece. Whether you prefer solo play or a cooperative mode for up to 4 players, our semi-procedurally generated world ensures each gameplay is a unique experience.

Key Features


Solo or Co-op
Face the twisted experiments and nightmarish abominations alone, or team up with friends in a 4-player cooperative mode. Uncover the truth behind Project0 together, but beware the challenges intensify in numbers.

Challenging AI Enemies
Prepare for a relentless adversary. The creatures you'll face are aggressive, merciless, and above all, intelligent. Don't let yourself be seen or heard if you want to survive.

Semi-Procedural World Generation
Every playthrough is distinct with our semi-procedurally generated world. Dynamic environments and unexpected encounters ensure that no two games are alike, adding a layer of suspense to every session.

Immersive Atmosphere
Immerse yourself in a chilling atmosphere crafted through cutting-edge visuals and haunting sound design. The world of Project0 will keep you on the edge of your seat, heightening the horror at every turn.

Backstory

The world stands in a nuclear stalemate. No conflict can be resolved using nuclear weapons, as even the most foolish know that it would bring about the destruction of humanity. Nations are again seeking a holy grail to gain an advantage on the battlefield. This holy grail turns out to be the man himself. A company under the name The Agency, known mainly in the underworld and standing in the shadows of prominent political figures, has initiated a grand era of genetically modified humans, offering unearthly riches to those who provide the Agency with a prototype of a superhuman. They named this endeavor Project0. Pharmaceutical companies and laboratories from around the world joined the race, producing many unsuccessful experiments. Here your adventure begins. Where civilians, police, or military cannot enter, you must step in — a specialized expert in dealing with the worst abominations.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Violence or Gore, General Mature Content

name: Project0

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 11 - 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3770 or AMD Ryzen 5 1400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 1050 / AMD Radeon RX 570
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 11 - 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-6700K or AMD Ryzen 5 2600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce 1660Ti / AMD Radon RX 590
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: DLSS Support

Whether you prefer solo play or a cooperative mode for up to 4 players, our semi-procedurally generated world ensures each gameplay is a unique experience.
supported_languages:
English*, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
